question: Will Lost Ark be in the top 5 most played games on Steam on April 15, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether Lost Ark will be #1-5 on Steam in terms of peak players on April 15, 2022 at 11:59:59 PM ET. Results of this market will be decided by the official Steam player count ("Peak Today") available at https://store.steampowered.com/stats/. 

If Lost Ark is #1-5 or tied for any of those spots, the market will resolve "Yes", and otherwise "No." 

In the event the resolution source is not available on April 15, 2022 at 11:59:59 PM ET, another credible source will be chosen. If no other credible sources are available, the source will be checked every 24 hours until April 22, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, when the market will resolve 50-50.


The games listed at the resolution source will be ranked from highest to lowest based on the amounts in the "Peak Today" column. In the case of ties, the market will use standard competition ranking ("1224" ranking),  where each game's ranking number is 1 plus the number of games ranked above it.

question: NHL: Who will win Bruins vs. Jackets, scheduled for April 4, 7:00 PM ET?
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for April 4, 7:00 PM ET:

If the Boston Bruins win, the market will resolve to “Bruins”.

If the Columbus Blue Jackets win, the market will resolve to “Jackets”.

If the game is not completed by April 11 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Mitt Romney vote to confirm Ketanji Brown Jackson to SCOTUS by December 31, 2022?
description:
This market asks whether United States Senator Mitt Romney will vote in favor of confirming Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court of the United States (SCOTUS) by December 31, 2022.

If Mitt Romney votes in favor of confirming Ketanji Brown Jackson to the SCOTUS by December 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Outcomes of committee votes, hearings, reports, cloture votes, or other procedural votes will have no impact on the resolution of this market. 

This market only concerns the first such Senate confirmation vote for Ketanji Brown Jackson to the SCOTUS. If Mitt Romney does not vote, or does not have a vote in favor, the market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source is the official vote tally reported by the United States Senate (https://www.senate.gov/legislative/nominations/SupremeCourtNominations1789present.htm), however other credible reporting may also be used. Once the vote has been closed and the result of the vote announced, any request by any senator to add, remove, or alter a vote will not be considered in the resolution of this market, regardless of any change to the official vote tally reported by the primary resolution source or any other source.

question: Will Blake Masters win the 2022 Arizona Republican Senate nomination?
description:
This is a market on whether Blake Masters will win the Republican nomination for Senator from Arizona. The primary election is scheduled to take place on August 2, 2022.

If Blake Masters wins the Republican nomination for Senator from Arizona, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

Determination of the Republican nominee for the 2022 election for the Senator from Arizona will be based on a consensus of credible reporting; or, if there is ambiguity, the final state election authority certification or other final official determination of the 2022 election results.

If no Republican nomination for Senator from Arizona is made by October 24, 2022, 12:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50-50.

question: UFC 273: Who will win - Alexander Volkanovski or Chan Sung Jung (Korean Zombie)?
description:
This is a market on whether Alexander Volkanovski or Chan Sung Jung will win their bout, set to take place on April 9, 2022. 

If Alexander Volkanovski is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Volkanovski”. 
If Chan Sung Jung is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Jung”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after April 9 or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will the Brooklyn Nets make the 2022 NBA playoffs?
description:
The NBA playoffs are an annual best-of-seven elimination tournament held after the National Basketball Association (NBA)’s regular season to determine the league's champion. The 2022 playoffs will begin on April 16, 2022. The Finals are set to begin on June 2, with a potential Game 7 scheduled for June 19.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Brooklyn Nets qualify for the 2022 NBA playoffs and "No" otherwise. If for any reason the playoff teams aren't decided by April 22, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

question: Will the floor price of Azuki be 30 ETH or more on April 19?
description:
This is a market on whether Azuki will have a floor price of 30 ETH or more on April 19, 2022 (at 12:00 PM ET), according to https://opensea.io/collection/azuki.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, on the aforementioned check time, there are no Azukis* listed for sale for less than 30 ETH on the official Azuki collection page on OpenSea. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

*Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market. List time for an NFT can be found under “Trading History” by clicking the “Listing” filter and hovering over the date.

Note that the exact price at the check time will be used. If no floor price is available at the check time, the source will be checked every following hour. For valid listings that are declining price auctions, the price exactly at the check time will be used, NOT the price at the initial listing time.
